H0.text: who was defeated in the french and indian war. Britain

H1.text: who was defeated in the french and indian war. Native American Tribes

H2.text: who was defeated in the french and indian war. Spain

H3.text: who was defeated in the french and indian war. France

A4.text: The Treaty of Paris in 1763 resulted in France surrendering its continental North American possessions east of the Mississippi to Britain.

A5.text: The British captured Fort Niagara and defeated the French at the Thousand Islands in 1759, leading to the French capitulation at Quebec.
